Description: This is a complete 1980’s Roland guitar synthesizer set including the vintage Roland G-707 Guitar Synthesizer Controller and Roland GR-700 Programmable Analog Guitar Synthesizer. If you’re not familiar with this guitar synthesizer, there’s a lot of information online. This set also includes the hard to find 24-pin connector cord, which sells for up to $200 alone. There are some marks, scratches and dings on the guitar, but it’s in very good condition considering the age. The custom fit, original G-707 case is included. The GR-Synthesizer works great, but there is an issue. The memory doesn’t work, and you cannot save custom sounds that you have programmed within the synthesizer. I am, however, including an M-16C memory cartridge that you can use to save what you program. Because the synthesizer unit doesn’t save, you have to initiate the factory settings each time you turn it on. Other than that, it works great and has some fun and wild sounds. The specs below are from Wayne Scott Joness website, a great resource. https://www.joness.com/gr300/G-707.html. Ships to lower 48 states only. G-707 Guitar Synthesizer Controller Body: Ash Finish: Acrylic, silver, red, or black Neck: Maple with ABS stabilizer bar Fingerboard: Frets: 22 Bridge: Roland tremolo Nut: Polycarbonate Tuning machines: Gotoh, 6 in-line Pickups: Two Roland Humbuckers Scale: 25 1/2" Truss Rod: Single, Adjustable Neck Width: 1 5/8" Body Width:9" Body Depth: 1 3/4" Overall Length: 39 1/2" Weight: 8 lbs 12 oz. GR-700 Synthesizer 6 voice, Dual Oscillator Synth Engine Based on the Roland JX-3P/MKS-30 3 - Selectable Octave Settings for Each Oscillator, 2’, 4’ and 8’ Choice of Square, Sawtooth or Pulse Waveform, plus Noise for Oscillator 2 Cross Modulation Between Oscillators Frequency Modulation with Envelope and/or Modulation VCF Low-Pass Filter with LFO, Envelope and Pitch Modulation Variable High-Pass Filter Four Stage Envelope Generator Low Frequency Oscillator for Vibrato Effects Selectable Dynamic Control Over Pitch, Filter and Amplifier per string Selectable Pitch Bend, Hold and Voice On/Off per String Lush Analog Chorus Mode Programming Via Foot switches or with optional PG-200 Programmer Dimensions: 27 3/16" (W) 14 3/4" (D) 6 1/8" (H) Power Requirements: 45 watts
Title: Roland G-707 and GR-700 Vintage Guitar Controller and Synthesizer
ConditionDescription: Very good used condition. See full description below.
